content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ecdc_cases WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/ecdc_cases/latest/ecdc_cases.csv'
);

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/ecdc_cases/latest/ecdc_cases.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        firstrow=1,
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    ) AS [result]

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFormat WITH (  FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET );

create schema ecdc

go

create external table ecdc.cases (
    date_rep        date,
    day    smallint,
    month             smallint,
    year  smallint,
    cases smallint,
    deaths            smallint,
    countries_and_territories       varchar(8000),
    geo_id             varchar(8000),
    country_territory_code           varchar(8000),
    pop_data_2018           int,
    continent_exp             varchar(8000),
    load_date      datetime2(7),
    iso_country   varchar(8000)
) with (
    data_source= ecdc_cases,
    location = 'latest/ecdc_cases.parquet',
    file_format = ParquetFormat
);
GO



select top 10  *
from  ecdc.cases as a

select continent = ISNULL(continent_exp, 'Total'), cases = sum(cases), deaths = sum(deaths)
from  ecdc.cases as a
group by continent_exp --with rollup
order by sum(cases) desc

select countries_and_territories = ISNULL(countries_and_territories, 'Total'), cases = sum(cases), deaths = sum(deaths)
from  ecdc.cases as a
group by countries_and_territories --with rollup
order by sum(cases) desc

select concat(year,'-',month) monthName, cases = sum(cases), deaths = sum(deaths)
from ecdc.cases as a
where geo_id = 'IN'
group by concat(year,'-',month)
order by concat(year,'-',month)

select  DATE_REP, CASES,
        CASES_AVG = AVG(CASES) OVER(order by date_rep ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND 2 FOLLOWING  )
from ecdc.cases as a
where geo_id = 'IN' order by date_rep

select DATE_REP, CASES,
        CUMULATIVE = SUM(CASES) OVER (ORDER BY date_rep)
from ecdc.cases as a
where geo_id = 'IN'
order by date_rep



select top 50  *
from ecdc.cases as a;

select  TOP 10 date_rep, countries_and_territories,
        cases,
        prev = LAG(CASES, 7) OVER(partition by geo_id order by date_rep )
from ecdc.cases as a
order by date_rep desc;
GO

select  TOP 10 date_rep, countries_and_territories,
        current_avg = AVG(CASES) OVER(partition by geo_id order by date_rep ROWS BETWEEN 7 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW  ),
        prev_avg = AVG(CASES) OVER(partition by geo_id order by date_rep ROWS BETWEEN 14 PRECEDING AND 7 PRECEDING  )
from ecdc.cases as a
order by date_rep desc;
GO

select  TOP 50 date_rep, continent_exp,
        current_avg = AVG(CASES) OVER(partition by continent_exp order by date_rep ROWS BETWEEN 7 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW  ),
        prev_avg = AVG(CASES) OVER(partition by continent_exp order by date_rep ROWS BETWEEN 14 PRECEDING AND 7 PRECEDING  )
from ecdc.cases as a
order by date_rep desc;
GO
